segments.text: Hello Mr Waterstone , what can I do for you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , Becky . Well , you see , I have this thing here , called a Fixed Deposit Certificate , and I've just noticed the date on it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I see . You have two choices here you can either redeem or renew .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I'll redeem , if that's not a problem .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem at all , Mr Waterstone . Any preference as to how you want the money ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Anything you like , but not too many large notes . It's useful to have smaller notes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here we go , Mr Waterstone . Here's your money and your interest note .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , yes . Everything's fine . Thank you very much , Becky .
segments.speaker: S2
